item.description: Grimdark Fantasy # Check out these links for More Reading on Grimdark and its place in the Fantasy Spectrum What is Grimdark Beware of Heroes - A Guide to Grimdark Is it Grimdark or is it Horror? Heroic, Realistic, and Grimdark – the Shades of Fantasy
